item.title: January 2020 Progress Report
item.description: 🚀 Started DevRider 🚀 Created Windows Release Package for HttpRider (https://www.deskriders.dev/projects/http-rider/) 🚀 Started MindBooks 🚀 Started new series on Tooltips February Goals: 📝 Add links to MindBook to buy books 📝 Promote Mindbooks on ProductHunt, IndieHackers and other channels 📝 Publish around 30 tooltips 📝 Move tooltips to its own website
